bio: Even headless, he gives 110 percent. He dreams of reuniting with his head someday... Not sure how he dreams—he just does.

soultimate.name: Lock of Steel
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases ally Defense by 210% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Nearby allies' defense boosted for a time.

skill.effect: Soul Meter increases when guarding foe’s attack.
skill.name: Guardian Spirit
